:py:mod:`nexoclom2.initial_state.SurfaceInteraction`
====================================================

.. py:module:: nexoclom2.initial_state.SurfaceInteraction

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Keep this for setting other surface interaction types.

   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   nexoclom2.initial_state.SurfaceInteraction.SurfaceInteraction




.. py:class:: SurfaceInteraction(sparam: (dict, tinydb.table.Document))


   
   Set parameters for surface interactions.

   Set parameters for interactions between the surface and atoms that return
   to the surface. See :ref:`surfaceinteractions` for more information.

   :Parameters:

       **sparams** : dict
           keys, values for defining surface interactions.












   :Attributes:

       ****
           ..
